So my name's Flavia Humphreys, we're just outside Clamvutherlin High School and I'm here with...
With Gary Tatlow.

My talk was about the Olympic Games. When I lived in Cyprus I went to America
and I got a gold in the 400 metres and a silver in the long jump.
I was very competitive and I came first in the 400 metres and second in the long jump.
So what was the experience like of training for the Olympics? How much training did you do?
Not a lot but it was quite experience and very, very good training.

I stayed in a university.

No, we didn't have any anthems.
